name: Haris Ali Khan
bio: Haris Ali Khan, widely known as CodeWithHarry, is a software engineer, educator, and YouTuber who simplifies programming for millions of learners. He creates practical, beginner-friendly tutorials that focus on building real-world coding skills across multiple domains.
teachingStyle: Project-based, beginner-friendly explanations with a focus on real-world applications
achievements: Top educator and content creator in the Indian programming community
Founder of the CodeWithHarry YouTube channel with millions of subscribers
Created multiple popular coding courses covering Python, Web Development, and Data Science
Known for simplifying complex programming topics into easy, step-by-step tutorials
